valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Sat 3 Jan 2026 to 18:00 (UTC) on Sun 4 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low Trafalgar 991 moving east, filling 996 by midday tomorrow. New low German Bight 1000 by same time

Viking.text:
Wind
In west, northwesterly 6 to gale 8, veering mainly northeasterly 3 to 5 later. In east, northeasterly veering easterly or southeasterly, 3 to 5.
Sea state
In west, very rough becoming rough later. in east, moderate or rough.
Weather
Squally snow showers.
Visibility
In west, good, occasionally very poor. In east, good, occasionally very poor.
Viking.gale_warning:
Gale warning
Issued:
03:40 (UTC) on Sat 3 Jan 2026
Northerly gale force 8 continuing
Viking.wind: In west, northwesterly 6 to gale 8, veering mainly northeasterly 3 to 5 later. In east, northeasterly veering easterly or southeasterly, 3 to 5.
Viking.sea_state: In west, very rough becoming rough later. in east, moderate or rough.
Viking.visibility: In west, good, occasionally very poor. In east, good, occasionally very poor.
